name: Bandung sea of fire
description:
Bandung Sea Of The Fire is a game that is inspired by the history of bandung laut which has the main character who has a mission to blow up army ammunition warehouse. You are a savior who will defend his life for Indonesia, also destroyed the military arsenal beyond that.

Bandung Sea Of The Fire is a game that is inspired by the history of bandung laut api which the story main character has a mission to detonate ammunition cellar owned by Dutch troops. In the first step of Bandung Game Sea Of Fire, players must have a mission or mission to find ammunition warehouse belongs to the Dutch army. Later when looking for ammunition warehouse, players will try the soldiers who will try to kill the players. The player must also kill his enemy soldiers to get to the ammunition warehouse and destroy it. Its gameplay is not to get close to power because it will shoot you guys. Gameplay modes like games from super mario bros in 2D.
